This page should concentrate information about all things people do to ensure Ubuntu Quality. For now, this page has the intention of list all tools, scripts and reports people use and rely on to do their daily jobs.

=== Server team ===
Ursula Junque (Ursinha)

==== Reports ====
* Packages with a higher version in Debian Sid - could indicate a required merge, sync or cherry pick: http://people.ubuntu.com/~davewalker/server-sid-new.txt
* As the cycle begins to develop, the tags server-o-ors and server-o-oro, are used to track bugs worthy of documenting for release status.  This operates independently of mile-stoned bugs.
* Server related SRU status is tracked through: http://people.canonical.com/~chucks/SRUTracker/
